quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Dreams show you that you have the power...
Before your dreams can come true, you have to have those dreams.
If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
A man's dreams are an index to his greatness.
A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.
Our truest life is when we are in our dreams awake.
Dreams are necessary to life.
A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
Choosing goals that are important to you is one of the most essential things you can do in order to live your dreams.
And our dreams are who we are.
Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Dreams show you that you have the power...
Before your dreams can come true, you have to have those dreams.
If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
A man's dreams are an index to his greatness.
A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.
Our truest life is when we are in our dreams awake.
Dreams are necessary to life.
A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
Choosing goals that are important to you is one of the most essential things you can do in order to live your dreams.
And our dreams are who we are.
Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
At last now you can be what the old cannot recall and the young long for in dreams, yet still include them all.
Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.
Friends, such as we desire, are dreams and fables.
Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
I know how men in exile feed on dreams of hope.
I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.
Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
Men are the dreams of a shadow.
All books are either dreams or swords.
All our dreams can come true — if we have the courage to pursue them.
Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
Dreams are not what you see in sleep. They are the things that do not let you sleep.
Dreams are real as long as they last. Can we say more of life?
Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
Dreams grow holy put in action.
Dreams grow if you grow.
Dreams have only the pigmentation of fact.
Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.
Friend, of my infinite dreams Little enough endures; Little howe'er it seems, It is yours, all yours.
Genius is an African who dreams up snow.
God, that checkroom of our dreams.
God, that dumping ground of our dreams.
Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly.
Hollywood has always been a cage... a cage to catch our dreams.
Hopes are but the dreams of those that wake.
I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.
I have had dreams, and I have had nightmares. I overcame the nightmares because of my dreams.
I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.
I want to keep my dreams, even bad ones, because without them, I might have nothing all night long.
I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours.
If dreams are like movies, then memories are films about ghosts.
If you can't read, it's going to be hard to realize dreams.
In dreams begin responsibility.
In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them.
Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.
Man dreams of fame while woman wakes to love.
Maybe we are less than our dreams, but that less would make us more than some Gods would dream of.
Much can be inferred about a man from his mistress: in her one beholds his weaknesses and his dreams.
Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.
No person has the right to rain on your dreams.
Only for his dreams is a man responsible, his actions are what he must do.
Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.
Our dreams drench us in senses, and senses steps us again in dreams.
Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
That is the true genius of America, a faith in the simple dreams of its people, the insistence on small miracles.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
The moment of enlightenment is when a person's dreams of possibilities become images of probabilities.
The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
The psychoanalysts pick our dreams as if they were our pockets.
They've promised that dreams can come true - but forgot to mention that nightmares are dreams, too.
Thought are but dreams till their effects are tried.
To provoke dreams of terror in the slumber of prosperity has become the moral duty of literature.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
We are such stuff
We are such stuff as dreams are made on, and our little life, is rounded with a sleep.
We do not really feel grateful toward those who make our dreams come true; they ruin our dreams.
We grow by our dreams.
We grow great by dreams. All big men are dreamers.
We should train our desires to show the way to our dreams.
We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
When you stop having dreams and ideals - well, you might as well stop altogether.
When your dreams tire, they go underground and out of kindness that's where they stay.
Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.
You have the courage and power to live your dreams.
You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
